title: Higher Education Teaching Development Program Design Based on the Performance Pyramid Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of pedagogical methods and awareness of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused education through VR simulation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Design an educational needs assessment system by analyzing the three support dimensions (individual, instructional, organizational) of the Performance Pyramid Model
Develop and apply language education instructional materials in simulation/VR environments
Measure educational effectiveness and propose improvement strategies through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
